text: Kankai Municipality is a municipality in Jhapa District of Nepal. In May 2014 two village development committees, Surunga and Ghailadubba joined together to form this municipality.72 new municipalities announced My RepublicaGovt announces 72 new municipalities The Kathmandu Postpopulation data Surunga, Ghailadubba, Laxmipur and Durgapur are major places for trade in this municipality. ==References== Category:Cities in Nepal Category:Municipalities of Nepal
title: Kankai Municipality
